title: 34: Walmarts in Sioux Falls, SD
description:
Calling all Walmartians! We came out of our basement to bring you an episode chock full of glory holes and racism. But don't worry, Christine left her teen greeters down there with the hair and stains. Needless to say, we hope you enjoy another exploration of awful reviews and the people who write them.  Logo by Courtney DeKorte. Theme by Mavus White. Music by PSOVOD and tyops. 

Buy our merch! https://store.dftba.com/collections/beach-too-sandy-water-too-wet
